Package camzup.pfriendly

Class Up3

java.lang.Object
processing.core.PImage
processing.core.PGraphics
processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL
camzup.pfriendly.UpOgl
camzup.pfriendly.Up3
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUp, IUp3, IUpOgl, java.lang.Cloneable, PConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
Yup3, Zup3
public abstract class Up3
extends UpOgl
implements IUpOgl, IUp3
An abstract parent class for 3D renderers.

    • scale

      public void scale​(Vec3 dim)
      Scales the renderer by a dimension.
      Parameters:

    • setDepthSorting

      public void setDepthSorting​(boolean ds)
      Sets whether or not depth sorting is enabled. Flushes the geometry.
      Parameters:
      ds - the depth sorting

    • setEyeDist

      public void setEyeDist​(float ed)
      Sets the eye distance of the camera. The value is usually set by the camera function, and to calculate the far clip plane of perspective functions, but is exposed for public access.
      Parameters:
      ed - the eye distance

    • setLoc

      v - the vector

    • text

      public void text​(char[] chars, int start, int stop, float x, float y, float z)
      This parent function attempts to translate the text and then undo the translation. It's better to acknowledge that text is 2D, not 3D, in nature.
      Overrides:
      text in class UpOgl
      Parameters:
      chars - the character array
      start - the start index, inclusive
      stop - the stop index, exclusive
      x - the x coordinate
      y - the y coordinate
      z - the z coordinate

    • text

      public void text​(java.lang.String str, float x, float y, float z)
      This parent function attempts to translate the text and then undo the translation. It's better to acknowledge that text is 2D, not 3D, in nature.
      Overrides:
      text in class UpOgl
      Parameters:
      str - the string
      x - the x coordinate

      z - the z coordinate
